content.raw:
One problem with that Jenkins job is that it didn't run the GPU tests, and it turns out that the INTEGRATION_pr2 and INTEGRATION_speed_pr2 tests are timing out. To reproduce the error, insert a pr2 into an empty world and the server will deadlock. With gdb, I've found where it's getting stuck:
~~~
(gdb) bt
#0  __lll_lock_wait () at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/lowlevellock.S:135
#1  0x00007ffff6a7a672 in _L_lock_953 () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#2  0x00007ffff6a7a4da in __GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x8ec450) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:114
#3  0x00007ffff7075f80 in lock (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:110
#4  boost::unique_lock<boost::recursive_mutex>::lock (this=this@entry=0x7fffffffdb80)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/lock_types.hpp:346
#5  0x00007ffff709e78b in unique_lock (m_=..., this=0x7fffffffdb80)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/lock_types.hpp:124
#6  gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::AddSensor (this=0x8ec420, _sensor=...)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:574
#7  0x00007ffff709e9dc in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (
    this=0x7ffff7667140 <SingletonT<gazebo::sensors::SensorManager>::GetInstance()::t>,
    _force=<optimized out>) at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:115
#8  0x00000000004113df in gazebo::Server::Run (this=this@entry=0x6e4c80)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/Server.cc:474
#9  0x000000000040d0cb in main (argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffdea8)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/server_main.cc:40
(gdb)
~~~
content.html:
One problem with that Jenkins job is that it didn't run the GPU tests, and it turns out that the INTEGRATION_pr2 and INTEGRATION_speed_pr2 tests are timing out. To reproduce the error, insert a pr2 into an empty world and the server will deadlock. With gdb, I've found where it's getting stuck:

(gdb) bt
#0  __lll_lock_wait () at ../nptl/sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/lowlevellock.S:135
#1  0x00007ffff6a7a672 in _L_lock_953 () from /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0
#2  0x00007ffff6a7a4da in __GI___pthread_mutex_lock (mutex=0x8ec450) at ../nptl/pthread_mutex_lock.c:114
#3  0x00007ffff7075f80 in lock (this=<optimized out>)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/pthread/recursive_mutex.hpp:110
#4  boost::unique_lock<boost::recursive_mutex>::lock (this=this@entry=0x7fffffffdb80)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/lock_types.hpp:346
#5  0x00007ffff709e78b in unique_lock (m_=..., this=0x7fffffffdb80)
    at /usr/include/boost/thread/lock_types.hpp:124
#6  gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::SensorContainer::AddSensor (this=0x8ec420, _sensor=...)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:574
#7  0x00007ffff709e9dc in gazebo::sensors::SensorManager::Update (
    this=0x7ffff7667140 <SingletonT<gazebo::sensors::SensorManager>::GetInstance()::t>,
    _force=<optimized out>) at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/sensors/SensorManager.cc:115
#8  0x00000000004113df in gazebo::Server::Run (this=this@entry=0x6e4c80)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/Server.cc:474
#9  0x000000000040d0cb in main (argc=2, argv=0x7fffffffdea8)
    at /tmp/buildd/gazebo4-prerelease-4.0.0/gazebo/server_main.cc:40
(gdb)
